Losgar was a place at the mouth of the Firth of Drengist
column3: the cold lands northwest of Beleriand.

column1: It was here that Fëanor landed during the Long Night with the stolen swan-ships of the Falmari
column2: and gave the order to burn them
column3: to force the host of Fingolfin and Finrod to march across the deadly Helcaraxë. According to a legend
column4: another reason to do so was to prevent some Noldor from turning back
column5: such as his own som Amrod
column6: who was uncomfortable with his fathers deeds. Amrod died as he was still sleeping inside the first ship burned.
